*This announcement is for a prospective contractor looking to be engaged for bid.*

### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND), Garrison Wainwright, requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of cleaning and disinfection services to be used on an “as-and-when-required” basis. The services shall be carried out on-site, and the tendon involves the supply of all labor, materials, and equipment required to meet the scope of work.

### Invitation to Tender

The services covered by this Standing Offer will be engaged on a “as-and-when required” basis, in accordance with the statement of work detailed in annex A. Only one Standing Offer will be selected.

The period of this Standing Offer is 1 year, with 3 option periods of 1 year each.

### Bidder Eligibility

Only Canadian and European Union companies are eligible to bid.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Important Details

* The tender closing date and time are 16/12/2022, 14:00:00 EST.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EST on the closing date and time will be considered non-conform.
* Supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before the closing date and time.

### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries relating to this project, please contact Fatima Vallee at:

fatima.vallee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
